title: Handkerchief/scarf (Japan), 20th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: printed on plain weave with hand rolled edges
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 44.5 x 42 cm (17 1/2 x 16 9/16 in.)
description: White square printed in black with small scenes telling the "Story of silk" from "egg-laying of moths" to "fabrics" in 26 illustrations. Four sides rolled and hemmed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Handkerchief/scarf (Japan), 20th century. Medium: silk
Technique: printed on plain weave with hand rolled edges. 
Gift of Anonymous Donor. a-t-835
